node.excerpt: Continuing from the musings on errors

Program errors are intended to express unexpected events during the carrying out of a set of instructions.
An unexpected event may sound…
*Tana-ta-tana-ta-tana-ta-tana-ta**Tana-ta-tana-ta-tana-ta-tana-ta*This is the last chance you get… Open wide!— The ChariotFor many people…
